newsitem.title: USA: Grow Biz board approves stockholder buy.
newsitem.headline: Grow Biz board approves stockholder buy.

text.p: Grow Biz International Inc said Friday a director's committee approved the purchase of additional shares by Sheldon Fleck and his spouse, Terry, who already jointly own a 9.3-percent stake in the company.
The company said the Flecks may buy additional shares that could give them more than 10 percent of its outstanding common stock. Further details were not available.
Grow Biz also announced a continuation of a previously announced stock repurchase program, involving 431,506 shares.
Grow Biz operates and franchises value-oriented retail stores. Its shares closed unchanged Friday at 8-7/8.
